section.11: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah that:A man came to him and said: "Last night I recited Al-Mufassal in one rak'ah." He said: "That is like reciting poetry. But the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to recite similar surahs, twenty surahs from Al-Mufassal, those that start with Ha-Mim
